name: ez-opendata
description: Wrap open-data sources (wikipedia, openstreetmap, wikimedia commons, etc...) calls in simple javascript functions.

scripts.test_dev: rm -f index.js; tsc --build tsconfig.test.json --watch ; rm index.js
scripts.test: rm -f index.js; tsc --build tsconfig.test.json && node test.mjs ; rm index.js

author: tbo47
